Ah, so you've come to see the clan hall!
Good idea! A clan hall is something that every clan should have, don't you agree?
There is a Clan Hall, which can be purchased at the auction and Resupply Hall, which can be obtained by winning the auction.
There are many wonderful things here, so take your time!
(When returning to the Vault Clan bid amount in excess of 100 billion adena disappears.)
